Happiness Month

So let's be clear. It is not special. Every day is Happiness Day for all involved in lifecollege.org. 'Special Happiness Month' would be tautological - all is indeed as usual, i.e., not special. Yet, outside, we still find those who seek happiness not, and, therefore, do not find.

Our learning point: If one holds happiness as a central value in one's life, making it a shaper of destiny, do we need to seek it at all? Should it not always be present? We are our values.

To make Happiness Month all it can be, we know one's values need to be 'sharpened' throughout life, to be revisited regularly, ensuring such values are central to and alive in one's life. Always part of one's destiny, constantly enlivened, sought & always held. Central Values are as one: one's true self, and one's real life. Our Happiness Programme flows through 21 Happiness Activities with you.

So as a Central Value, with lifecollege.org, let us re-aliven happiness through Happiness Month - November, 2021...

Leadership Excellence

Our 'Excellence in Leadership' programmes cover the development of confidence and courage, how to realise self-leadership potential and increase personal and organisational creativity. By keeping your senior people free to think, through excellence in goal setting, project leadership, time management, developing others, delegation, applying leadership to all management situations, you will return many-fold what you invest, year after year after year.

'When the best rulers achieve their purpose, their subjects claim the achievement as their own.' - Lao Tzu

Championing Champions

Champion their confidence, their presence, their success - and yours, your team's and your organization's builds too. Everyone Wins.

We work alongside you as you build your leaders - Your Champions. Progression is focused on you as we accompany you, sharpeing your championing skills and inspiring your team/s to ever increasing success. When they are champions you become The Champion of Champions.

When championed well, a team becomes its own champion, each member then looks to champion their own team thus cascading everyone's successes forward.

By being a Champion of Champions you are free to further evolve your leadership - your championing skills - further enhancing your and their success.

Happiness... Month

So let's be clear. It is not special. Every day is Happiness Day for all involved in lifecollege.org. 'Special Happiness Month' would be tautological - all is indeed as usual, i.e., not special. Yet, outside, we still find those who seek happiness not, and, therefore, do not find.

Our learning point: If one holds happiness as a central value in one's life, making it a shaper of destiny, do we need to seek it at all? Should it not always be present? We are our values.

To make Happiness Month all it can be, we know one's values need to be 'sharpened' throughout life, to be revisited regularly, ensuring such values are central to and alive in one's life. Always part of one's destiny, constantly enlivened, sought & always held. Central Values are as one: one's true self, and one's real life. Our Happiness Programme flows through 21 Happiness Activities with you.

So as a Central Value, with lifecollege.org, let us re-aliven happiness through Happiness Month - November, 2021...

Leadership Excellence!

Our 'Excellence in Leadership' programmes cover the development of confidence and courage, how to realise self-leadership potential and increase personal and organisational creativity. By keeping your senior people free to think, through excellence in goal setting, project leadership, time management, developing others, delegation, applying leadership to all management situations, you will return many-fold what you invest, year after year after year.

'When the best rulers achieve their purpose, their subjects claim the achievement as their own.' - Lao Tzu

We all have our favourite leadership quotes, but the leadership role is a personal one...yours is the one we work with when you join our Leadership Development Programme. If you want a colleague or a team to join, it's their personal leadership we will work with.

"A GREAT leader makes happen anything they intend and skilfully avoids the unintended through great self knowledge. Being consciously aware of the potentials and constraints of one’s abilities, yet always being energised by possibilities, is a mark of true leadership. ... Inspired leaders move in that warm milieu comprising great integrity – fairness, honesty, openness – that passion for humanity which pervades all they do. The potential leader builds the confidence to be great with and through others, and a gentle yet strong self belief and a calling for a balanced greater good which may well manifest through self-created [self-sourced] life purpose. Their inspiration generates a great internalised equilibrium, an intuitive power; a strong belief and a sense of being which is their source of inspiration within themselves and is manifest so strongly through others: this is leadership."

We understand how to develop these skills in leaders and potential leaders. We can deliver them into your company's skills bank in an accessible, usable form through experiencial learning, coaching and mentoring with full certification from ILM - The Institute of Leadership and Managment.

If you want to experience an unusually energising programme of self-development, or if you feel it would benefit your team or someone you know Contact Us Now.

×

Championing Champions

Champion their confidence, their presence, their success - and yours, your team's and your organization's builds too. Everyone Wins.

We work alongside you as you build your leaders - Your Champions. Progression is focused on you as we accompany you, sharpeing your championing skills and inspiring your team/s to ever increasing success. When they are champions you become The Champion of Champions.

When championed well, a team becomes its own champion, each member then looks to champion their own team thus cascading everyone's successes forward.

By being a Champion of Champions you are free to further evolve your leadership - your championing skills - further enhancing your and their success.

Individual and/or Team, this programme moves through bold action, inspirational leadership, motivation, communication, courage, initiative, creativity, resilience, confidence - leading to outperformance for all.

Talk to us about how we structure the programme around your needs both personal and organisational. This program focuses on your opportunities, your abilities and, through you and where appropriate, your team. Everyone becomes their own Champion.

Existing clients report ever- increasing opportunities opening up as their champions build on their strengths, identify new possibilities, create new solutions, evolve, deliver and win more.

"I am now known as a 'Champion of Champions', both inside and outside my organisation. I applaud the ongoing return on my investment in the 'Championing Champions' experience. By continuously inspiring my people to win by being entrepreneurial and take ownership they are winning and will continue to do so. The on-going great results always speak for themselves.

This courage to boldly ask for, inspire and communicate success through ever more confident, more open relationships of integrity and self-belief, has led to continuous success for myself and my teams. We are all winners!"

Dom Goodale, CEO, Dancor Group
